subject: Re: [LH] Kate Bush -- Bad Neighbor! (more details)
body:
Donny Bravo wrote:

> Not too many, I'd guess. All of these Global Warming Alarmists want 
> someone else to do all the savings, or they want to get off easy by 
> buying the bogus global warming offsets, which are clearly a joke.

Holy shit Don. Even after all the years, you remain firmly entrenched in 
anti establishment mantra.

Take the global warming out of the equation and concentrate on 
pollution. What legacy are we leaving behind for our kids? Granted, that 
doesn't affect you, but it will affect people you know, eventually.
